data.name: Anime Feet 2
data.detailed_description:
The game

Anime Feet is a puzzle game, each level comes with an increase in the challenge. Alongside the two exclusive puzzle game formulas that the first game has, we cooked a third new game mode for you to venture.

Features


- Enjoy 15 levels + 2 included with the FREE DLC.

- Visit the Gallery, revealing our pretty girls with cute feet by completing the levels.
data.about_the_game:

data.short_description: The long awaited sequel of Anime Feet series is here! Now with even more feets!
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Portuguese, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP/Vista/7/8/10
  • Processor: 2 Ghz Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card supporting DirectX 9.0c
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes:
-This game includes suggestive / provocative sexual content.
-Not suitable for watching at work.
-Not suitable for all ages.
-All characters in the game are over 18 years old.
